name: Person
description: An individual agent contributing to research activities, such as a researcher, scholar, or developer.

name: Research Project
description: A research project is an organized collaborative initiative that oversees the development of one or more research products, involving the participation of multiple agents.

name: Organization
description: A structured entity, such as a university, research institute, or company, coordinating and supporting research projects and activities.

name: Research Product
description: Research products are the tangible outcomes of research activities, including Digital Scholarly Editions, Text Collections, Linked Open Data, Software, Ontologies, and more.

name: Computer Program
description: A software application, script, or service, that processes, analyzes, or interacts with research products, enabling users to access and manipulate their content.

name: Web Site
description: A digital platform that provides access to information, resources, or services, typically hosted on the internet and accessible via a URL.
